thread.title: MICE planners urged to 'go wild' in Canada
thread.title_full: MICE planners urged to 'go wild' in Canada

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: MICE planners urged to 'go wild' in Canada
text:
MICE planners urged to 'go wild' in Canada MICE planners urged to 'go wild' in Canada Details Category: Venues & Events   16:00 The Magnificent 7 consortium of Canadian wilderness lodge owners has launched an exciting new promotion that encourages MICE planners to book corporate meetings and incentive programs that use nature as their venue. 
The group’s lodge-owning members are offering everything from wilderness survival teambuilding exercises such as walking with polar bears to meetings atop a glacier, breakout sessions on horseback or paddling a kayak and incentives itineraries aboard an antique yacht, the Pacific Yellowfin. To complete the ‘Frontier style’ wilderness feel of the packages, guests get to stay in the group’s collection of lodges and resorts set in pristine surroundings such as Siwash Lake Lodge and Nimmo Bay Wilderness Resort, with individual or multi-resort itineraries available.
